content: Price.

Actually, I just saw this personality test in a magazine.
It can reveal certain aspects about you.
For example, based on your choices, let me see...
Got any good suggestions, friend?

Don't overthink things?
...Just keep marching on...
You're right, overthinking won't do any good.

That's a brilliant idea, my friend!
So, would you like to join me for afternoon tea?
But I often used to crouch near flower beds, observing butterflies with their shimmering wings. That's the memory that stands out from my childhood.

You mean to say it's normal to feel lost,
It's normal to hesitate,
But hey, at least we have good food, right?
Don't overthink things. Just keep marching on.

I just saw this personality test in a magazine!
Let me think about your choice...
It shows that you're an objective, efficiency-driven rationalist!

Alright, tomorrow I'm wearing my favorite outfit,
and nobody's going to stop me.
<size=30>Except heavy rain...</size>

Later, the teachers at the Academia discovered that my doodles
matched almost perfectly with the trajectories of Lumia in the sky.
I was quite shocked myself, since I'd just been scribbling randomly...
Maybe.
I go to bed early and sleep like a log.

Haha, I thought you might say that.
Some say a good meal is the most powerful healer in the universe.
Not only does it fill us up, it also empowers us with the courage to take on anything.

I have an odd question, if you don't mind.
When choosing new clothes, what matters most to you?
Well then, today, let's go and try some delicious dishes that'll fill us with courage!

Looks like we both need to work on getting more sleep.
Sleep deprivation is terrible for your skin,
but I just can't help staying up late...
I've got something I'm curious about. What is the most memorable experience from your childhood?
Chill on the sofa.

When you don't even know...
What the meaning of your own existence is...
What would you do, if you were in that position?
Comfort.

Indeed, rather than dwelling on regrets,
let's cherish the present moment.
A steaming cup of tea and sweet cake by its side—
everything feels wonderful now.

I just saw this personality test in a magazine,
It can reveal certain aspects about you.
Let me see what your choice says...
I don't care what others think.
Chilled watermelon and orange soda.

Childhood summers spent catching insects sounds great,
but it's not for me.
I'm afraid of beetles with horns.

Oh? It's you, <color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>.
If I told you I sometimes feel lost too,
would you think I'm weak?
Style.
Doodling on my textbooks.

<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>,
Those were some pretty impressive words!
I'm even more impressed by you now!

I can be happy all day just by wearing clothes I like,
but sometimes I worry about what others might think.

So I'm not the only one who worries about this...
But sometimes I wonder,
are other people's opinions... really that important?

What a coincidence, I also like to doodle in my textbooks.
Don't know why, but
textbooks have this mysterious power that makes you want to draw on them.

It shows that you're a very independent thinker,
someone who stands out in all kinds of situations,
and gets noticed for their unique qualities.
Sometimes I can't sleep either.

The holiday is right around the corner,
But someone suddenly cancelled their plans with me.
An empty spot in my schedule?!
I've had some sleepless nights recently, staring at the night sky, wide awake. How about you? Have you been sleeping well?
Have a delicious feast.
Could it be that you mean just lying on the couch doing nothing? You actually... think the same as me!
Do housework.

I understand. (smiles)
What you miss isn't the sweetness of watermelon and soda,
but that carefree summer.

Whether your schedule is full or empty,
there is no right answer, is there?

When you feel lost,
just keep moving forward with that uncertainty,
someday, you'll reach a place where you can see your destination.
Burning the midnight oil with luxury skincare on standby—that's my lifestyle.

Do you ever feel the same way, <color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>?
Those times when you're unsure if what you're doing is right,
When you don't know why you're here,
Caught a kabuto beetle during summer vacation.

So I wanted to ask you,
do you ever change your style
based on what others think?

Ah, you reminded me of something I've been trying to avoid.
Laundry, airing out bedding, cleaning up...
I guess I have been ignoring quite a few essential chores.

Looks like I should follow your good example and get to bed earlier.
<size=30>I might save a lot of money on premium skincare products.</size>

It says that you live life at your own pace,
You don't just follow the crowd or get swept up in trends.
Having such a strong sense of self - that's a really amazing quality.
Time for afternoon tea.
